snippet: Democrats in particular were critical of the light touch used by Jim Lehrer, the moderator.
abstract: Jim Lehrer's light touch as moderator of the first presidential debate between Pres Obama and Mitt Romney has been widely criticized, particularly by Democrats who felt that Romney effectively moderated the debate himself; conservatives suggest critiques of Lehrer were just excuses for Obama's poor performance in the debate.
lead_paragraph: Democrats in particular were critical of the light touch used by Jim Lehrer, the moderator.

headline.seo: After Debate, a Harsh Light Falls on Jim Lehrer
headline.main: After a New-Look Debate, a Harsh Light Falls on the Moderator
headline.print_headline: After a New-Look Debate, a Harsh Light Falls on the Moderator
